text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea richetia is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a canopy tree, to 40 m in height, and endemic to Borneo. It is recorded from the Kubah National Park in Sarawak, Malaysia.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea richetia". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33431A9783932. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33431A9783932.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
